body_html:
I had a couple questions about the SAMPLE method and the intended use:

  1. would it be useful to have a mode that matches top_k exactly, so that any class returning true here would be included in the equivalent top_k call?

  2. what is SAMPLE used for? My understanding of the code is that it doesn't guarantee exactly k classes return true. Is that right?
body_text:
I had a couple questions about the SAMPLE method and the intended use:


would it be useful to have a mode that matches top_k exactly, so that any class returning true here would be included in the equivalent top_k call?


what is SAMPLE used for?  My understanding of the code is that it doesn't guarantee exactly k classes return true.  Is that right?
body:
I had a couple questions about the SAMPLE method and the intended use:

1. would it be useful to have a mode that matches top_k exactly, so that any class returning true here would be included in the equivalent top_k call?

2. what is SAMPLE used for?  My understanding of the code is that it doesn't guarantee exactly k classes return true.  Is that right?
